LFADS.Dataset¶

classLFADS.Dataset(collection, relPath)[source]¶

Bases: handle, matlab.mixin.Copyable, matlab.mixin.CustomDisplay

A single-day collection of raw data to be processed by LFADS

Abstract Methods

These methods you must define in order to retrieve whatever metadata are needed from this dataset

AbstractloadInfoFromData()[source]¶

This method should load any metadata about the dataset. There are no specific requirements. This simply enables an easy way to ensure that this potentially time-consuming computation is performed only once.

Properties

Information about the dataset's name and location

relPath = ''[source]¶

Path to the Matlab data file that will be loaded when loadData is called, relative to the path of the LFADS.DatasetCollection to which this Dataset belongs. If you override loadData, this can be left blank.

collection = None[source]¶

LFADS.DatasetCollection to which this Dataset belongs

name = ''[source]¶

Unique, semi-permanent identifier for the dataset. This will be used for paths and filenames and variables within the LFADS model, so it’s best to pick a scheme and stick to it.

comment = ''[source]¶

Textual comment for convenience

Properties

Useful metadata about this dataset to be loaded by loadInfoFromData. These are not used explicitly and can be left blank.

infoLoaded = false[source]¶

Has loadInfo already been called and the info fields populated?

subject = ''[source]¶

Dataset subject or participant name

saveTags = None[source]¶

Data grouping identifiers

datenum = None[source]¶

Matlab datenum identifying the collection time of this dataset

nChannels = None[source]¶

Number of spike channels recorded in this dataset

nTrials = None[source]¶

Number of behavioral trials recorded in this dataset

Dependent Properties

Dependentdatestr = None[source]¶

a string version of datenum

Dependentpath = None[source]¶

Full path to data which will be loaded by load data, a concatenation of the DatasetCollection path and relPath

Methods

[ds] = Dataset(collection, relPath)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • collection (LFADS.DatasetCollection) – DatasetCollection to which this Dataset belongs
  • relPath (string) – Relative path to data from collection.path
[data] = loadData()[source]¶

Load this Dataset’s data file from .path

reloadInfo()[source]¶

Load or reload this Dataset’s metadata even if already loaded

loadInfo()[source]¶

Load this Dataset’s metadata if not already loaded
